body_html: In my experience, the performance is similar when using MKL or MKL-DNN. Setting the environment variables for MKL might have a bigger effect. Please take a look at CPU optimizations guide for more information.
body_text: In my experience, the performance is similar when using MKL or MKL-DNN. Setting the environment variables for MKL might have a bigger effect. Please take a look at CPU optimizations guide for more information.
body: In my experience, the performance is similar when using MKL or MKL-DNN. Setting the environment variables for MKL might have a bigger effect. Please take a look at [CPU optimizations](https://www.tensorflow.org/performance/performance_guide#optimizing_for_cpu ) guide for more information.
